text: Confirming @jonathanvswan's reporting: Pres Trump is planning to pare down WH pressers & may stop holding them daily. A WH source tells me it’s partly because WH sees the coronavirus outbreak as past its peak. That person also said Trump's disinfectant comments were overblown.
